properties.name: parent
properties.description: The object's container.

properties.name: typename
properties.description: The class name of the object.

properties.name: textFont
properties.description: The text font.

properties.name: size
properties.description: Font size in points.

properties.name: horizontalScale
properties.description: Character horizontal scaling factor expressed as a percentage (100 = 100%)

properties.name: verticalScale
properties.description: Character vertical scaling factor expressed as a percentage (100 = 100%)

properties.name: autoLeading
properties.description: Whether to use automatic leading.

properties.name: leading
properties.description: The amount of space between two lines of text (in points)

properties.name: tracking
properties.description: The tracking or range kerning amount in thousands of an em.

properties.name: baselineShift
properties.description: The amount of shift (in points) of the text baseline.

properties.name: rotation
properties.description: The character rotation angle (in degrees)

properties.name: kerningMethod
properties.description: The automatic kerning method to use.

properties.name: capitalization
properties.description: The case of text.

properties.name: baselinePosition
properties.description: The baseline position of text.

properties.name: openTypePosition
properties.description: The OpenType baseline position.

properties.name: ligature
properties.description: Whether the ligature should be used.

properties.name: discretionaryLigature
properties.description: Whether the discretionary ligature should be used.

properties.name: contextualLigature
properties.description: Whether the contextual ligature should be used.

properties.name: fractions
properties.description: Whether the OpenType fractions should be used.

properties.name: ordinals
properties.description: Whether the OpenType ordinals should be used.

properties.name: swash
properties.description: Whether the OpenType swash should be used.

properties.name: titling
properties.description: Whether the OpenType titling alternates should be used.

properties.name: connectionForms
properties.description: Whether the OpenType connection forms should be used.

properties.name: stylisticAlternates
properties.description: Whether the OpenType stylistic alternates should be used.

properties.name: ornaments
properties.description: Whether the OpenType ornaments should be used.

properties.name: figureStyle
properties.description: Which figure style to use in OpenType font.

properties.name: proportionalMetrics
properties.description: Does the Japanese OpenType support proportional font?

properties.name: kana
properties.description: Does the Japanese OpenType support kana?

properties.name: italics
properties.description: Does the Japanese OpenType support italics?

properties.name: baselineDirection
properties.description: The Japanese text baseline direction.

properties.name: language
properties.description: The language of text.

properties.name: alternateGlyphs
properties.description: The alternate glyphs form.

properties.name: Tsume
properties.description: The percentage of space reduction around a Japanese character (100 = 100%)

properties.name: alignment
properties.description: The character alignment type.

properties.name: wariChuEnabled
properties.description: Whether WariChu is enabled.

properties.name: wariChuLines
properties.description: The number of Wari-Chu (multiple text lines fit into a space meant for one) lines.

properties.name: wariChuLineGap
properties.description: The Wari-Chu line gap.

properties.name: wariChuScale
properties.description: The Wari-Chu scale.

properties.name: tateChuYokoVertical
properties.description: The Tate-Chu-Yoko vertical adjustment in points.

properties.name: tateChuYokoHorizontal
properties.description: The Tate-Chu-Yoko horizontal adjustment in points.

properties.name: akiLeft
properties.description: The em amount of left aki.

properties.name: akiRight
properties.description: The em amount of right aki amount.

properties.name: noBreak
properties.description: Whether line breaks are allowed.

properties.name: fillColor
properties.description: The color of the text fill.

properties.name: strokeColor
properties.description: The color of the text stroke.

properties.name: overprintStroke
properties.description: Whether to overprint the stroke of the text.

properties.name: overprintFill
properties.description: Whether to overprint the fill of the text.

properties.name: strokeWeight
properties.description: Line width of stroke.

properties.name: underline
properties.description: Whether to underline the text.

properties.name: strikeThrough
properties.description: Whether to draw a strike through line over the text.

properties.name: kashidas
properties.description: Kashidas attribute.

properties.name: dirOverride
properties.description: Direction override attribute.

properties.name: digitSet
properties.description: Digit set attribute.

properties.name: diacVPos
properties.description: Diacritics positioning attribute.

properties.name: diacXOffset
properties.description: Diacritics x offset attribute.

properties.name: diacYOffset
properties.description: Diacritics y offset attribute.

properties.name: justificationAlternates
properties.description: Justification alternates attribute.

properties.name: stylisticSets
properties.description: Stylistic sets attribute.
